title: Ultra Rapid Fridays?
body: I'm sure I'm not alone in saying that I really miss URF mode. How about have it as something like twisted treeline? URF on Fridays only. That way normal and ranked lobbies wont have any issues finding players and we can still all have a lot of fun.

This is actually a great idea.

This is a good idea, although there are many factors to consider. 

1st: If they had it on a special day, then it would get boring extremely fast. I mean it was fun for the week or two that it was up; but if they re-release it, it may become another dominion. A ghost town. (That isn't even on OCE. Thanks Riot)

2nd: Some people may not enjoy it, although it was **BY FAR** the best, and most enjoyable game mode, a lot of people disliked it. (Hipsters pls)

3rd: It would strain the servers, it was extremely buggy and full of "OP" champions. If riot really wanted to implement a system like this they would have to actually put effort into bringing it back. Lets be honest, riot aren't going to attempt with that. IF they did bring it back they would need to put a lot of work into it to make it balanced, and permanently playable. (Lets face it, that would ruin the fun)

I personally love Urf, and I can't wait for its re-arrival, the only problem is that it may be destroyed if it is brought back. (Metaphorically speaking). I really can't wait for the revamp but there are so many aspects to consider if they are actually going to make it "URF Fridays".
